response.job_title: Renewable energy | Energy efficiency | Asset management
response.summary:
Electrical Engineer with knowledge in the areas of lighting and electrical installations, power systems, electrical machines, and renewable energies. Experience in energy efficiency consulting, project evaluation, solar project design, and lighting design. 

As a result of my work in the field of engineering and my continuous academic interest, I am an integral professional, assertive, analytical, proactive, with strong motivation aimed at results, able to lead multidisciplinary groups and propose mechanisms and processes aimed at generating efficiency.
response.skills: Mantenimiento eléctrico, Eficiencia energética, Data science, Assest management , Investigación, Ciencia de datos, Microsoft Office, Matlab, COMSOL Multiphysics, AutoCAD, OrCAD, Diseño de iluminación, GAMS, English, Microsoft Excel, Gestión de activos, Optimización, Liderazgo de equipos

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the operation and maintenance of a 26MWP solar plant with tracker array technology. 
My main responsibilities include calculating and monitoring the plant's KPIs indicators, preparing daily and monthly reports that analyze electrical and climatic variables to track plant performance, and ensuring the safety of the equipment and staff by planning and supervising the execution of preventive and corrective maintenance plans. Additionally, I am in charge of preparing warranty claims for operational assets.
profile_positions.title: O&M Manager

profile_positions.description: Consultant for energy efficiency studies for companies in the pharmaceutical chemical sector, based on ISO 50001 standards.
profile_positions.title: Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Teaching assistant of the diploma course in   Advanced Energy Management and ISO 500001 Auditor. This course addresses the technical aspects of renewable energies and the design and execution of a photovoltaic project from the engineering perspective, including the process required to connect a photovoltaic project. 

Additionally, we examine the indicators to evaluate a renewable energy project; such as the calculation of net present value, cash flow, internal rate of return, OPEX and CAPEX; and the software (PVsyst and PVsol) required to evaluate, design, and simulate photovoltaic systems. Finally, we review the current legislation and the tax benefits for these technologies in Colombia.
profile_positions.title: Teaching assistant

profile_positions.description: Directed research related to asset management and planning. My research focused on the optimization and implementation of street lighting systems through multi-period facets of investment. The research led to the implementation of a protocol designed to maximize energy savings. Our main proposal considered lamp aging and failure rate which was adopted into the decision-making process - from both a technical and economic standpoint.
profile_positions.title: Research fellow

profile_positions.description: Directed research related to asset management and planning. My research focused on the optimization and implementation of street lighting systems through multi-period facets of investment. The research led to the implementation of a protocol designed to maximize energy savings. Our main proposal considered lamp aging and failure rate which was adopted into the decision-making process - from both a technical and economic standpoint.
profile_positions.title: Junior Technical Consultant - Internship

profile_positions.description: Engineer in charge of providing technical assistance and supporting the planning, execution, and certification processes of the public lighting modernization project. The project seeks to improve the energy efficiency of Bogota's public lighting system by upgrading lighting luminaires from discharge technology to LED.
profile_positions.title: Junior professional

profile_positions.description:
As an inspector coordinator at Calidad de Energía S.A.S, my work involved ensuring the completeness of all documents required by the regulatory body and providing traceability in the provision of service through physical and digital means, as well as through the Synergy software.

During my tenure in this role, I requested the Technical Director to assign resources for generating work orders and notified the client and/or construction manager via email about project opening with a unique identification number and the assigned inspector.

I also requested technical personnel from the measurement process to support inspection-associated measures and conducted document inspections for each project, reporting the findings to the assigned inspector.

As an inspector coordinator, I worked closely with my team to ensure that all tasks were completed on time and with the appropriate quality standards. In addition, I developed critical skills for project management success, including leadership, effective communication, and problem-solving."
profile_positions.title: Inspector Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
-Gestionar el centro de entrenamiento para capacitaciones solicitadas, de personal propio, personal empresas contratistas y practicas del sena y otros centros educativos.

-Revisar inventario y actualizar las hojas de vida de los distintos equipos del centro de entrenamiento.

-Dictar charlas y capacitaciones a colegios, técnicos e ingenieros que requieran conocer el funcionamiento del centro de entrenamiento.

-Proponer y participar activamente en los diferentes proyectos que se puedan llevar acabo en el centro de entrenamiento.
profile_positions.title: Practicante Universitario

profile_positions.description:
Monitor para el proyecto: Earth Resistivity.
Esta investigación se realizó bajo la supervisión del Phd. Francisco José Román Campos, en conjunto con el ing. Daniel Gómez.
Cómo resultado, se presento un artículo en el International Symposium on High Voltage Engineering, realizado en Buenos Aires, Argentina.
profile_positions.title: Estudiante auxiliar y miembro del grupo UNAL-EMC
